task.title: Registering the License for DITA OT

context.p: To register the license for the for the DITA Open Toolkit, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Obtain a valid license for the Oxygen XML WebHelp Plugin at .
Open the /plugins/com.oxygenxml.webhelp.classic directory, create a file called licensekey.txt, and copy your license key that you purchased for your .
step.stepresult: When you execute a WebHelp Classic transformation script, the process reads the license key from this file. If the file does not exit, or it contains an invalid license, an error message will be displayed.

step.cmd: Do the same thing for the Responsive variant. Open the /plugins/com.oxygenxml.webhelp.responsive directory, create a file called licensekey.txt, and copy your license key that you purchased for your .
step.stepresult: When you execute a WebHelp Responsive transformation script, the process reads the license key from this file. If the file does not exit, or it contains an invalid license, an error message will be displayed.
